description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Mousse Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Mousse Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Loosen cakes from rings and place one of the stacks onto a serving plate. Spread reserved mousse over the top layer. Position the second stack on top of the first. Smooth sides if necessary. Slowly pour ganache onto the centre of the cake allowing it to drip down the sides. Chill to set. Decorate with white chocolate curls, if desired.
